text: Like any other website, Hyperstack uses 'cookies'.
Hyperstack retains the data collected from Google users only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.
Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and as that appear on Hyperstack, which are sent directly to users' browser.
Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
